revised_title: Auditory Threshold for Short Periods of Stimulation
tldr: This study investigates the threshold of audition for short periods of sound stimulation and finds that the threshold increases as the time of presentation decreases. The research suggests a relationship between the threshold intensity and the duration of the sound, which can be used to improve understanding of auditory perception and sensory mechanisms.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Auditory Perception
